product_name: Saris Bike Porter Trunk 2 Bike Rack
long_description: Made to safely transport 2 bikes with its rugged steel frame, padded lower bar and innovative rubber frame holders, the Saris Bike Porter Trunk 2 bike rack fits virtually any vehicle.
short_description: Made to safely transport 2 bikes with its rugged steel frame, padded lower bar and innovative rubber frame holders, the Saris Bike Porter Trunk 2 bike rack fits virtually any vehicle.
